content.description: Holds down low are super sharp and at risk for breaking, recommend stick clipping the first bolt in case one pops off. Very well placed bolts for clipping positions. Crux is the last move, can be accomplished via intermediate or one big dynamic move. Chains have surface rust but are solid, probably a good idea to rappel rather than lower off to save your rope. Once a leader sets up the anchors it can be top roped to work out the moves.This route was originally done as a boulder problem which goes at V1 R.
content.location: See the topo picture for location, it's the only bolted route on the Little Chief Boulder

content.description: This boulder is located diagonally next to the Chieftain Boulder housing many PA Highball classics.
